### gt Table
```{r}
fake <- data.frame(ID = seq(1,5), "Grade" = LETTERS[c(1:4,6)], "Birth Month"= month.abb[1:5], "Age" = sample(18:22,5, replace = TRUE))

gt(fake) %>%
  tab_header("Random Student Data")
```
